job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: At Particle Health we believe simple secure access to vital medical data will catalyze dramatic change in healthcare With a recent Series A close of 12M led by Menlo Ventures were leading the charge on developing a bestinclass developer experience a highly adaptable data transformation pipeline and building connections with even more critical data sources across the healthcare ecosystembrbrUnofficially We also intend to destroythefaxmachinebrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongParticle Healths software engineers develop the nextgeneration technologies that will change how millions of patients are able to leverage their medical records to better their care Our products need to simplify healthcare data standards at nationwide scale Were looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas including other healthtech companies information retrieval distributed computing security machine learning and natural language processingbrbrAs a software engineer you will work on projects critical to Particle Healths needs with opportunities to switch projects as you and our fastpaced business grow and evolve We need our engineers to be versatile display leadership qualities and be hungry to tackle new problems across our entire company as we continue to push both the technology and the industry as a whole forwardbrbrParticle Health is now and forever will be an engineering company We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technologys greatest challenges and make an impact on millions of patients At Particle Health engineers not only revolutionize access to electronic medical records they routinely work on industry data standards massive scale engineering challenges and nationwide health technology policybrbrAreas of ResponsibilitybrulliContribute to engineering efforts from design to implementation solving complex technical challenges around the health data interoperability spaceliliDesign and build advanced automated build test and release infrastructureliliDrive adoption of best practices in code health testing and maintainabilityliliAnalyze and decompose complex software systems and collaborate to influence design for testabilitybrliulIdeal Candidate ProfilebrbrThe ideal candidate willbrulliBe organized and proactive in coordinating work within the engineering team and able to communicate openly across product and business teamsliliPrioritize progress before perfection They deliver solutions incrementally and predictablyliliAlways be learning They bring action orientation and seek to continuously improve the teams they work with They excel in a culture centered on open communication strong feedback quick experimentation blamelessness and embracing failure to learn from itliliBe a strong communicator They believe in open and honest communication and work to cultivate this within the team and organization You approach everything with an open mind and listen to different perspectives when determining a path forwardbrliulstronguRequiredbrbrustrongQualificationsbrulliBachelors degree or equivalent practical experiencelili1 years of professional software development experienceliliExperience in any of the following programming languages Java C Python JavaScript or GobrliulNice to HavebrulliExperience with health data formats like HL7 V2 CDA FHIRliliMasters or PhD degree in Computer Science or related technical fieldliliExperience in debugging performance improvement optimization and refactoring codeliliExperience in one or more of the following automation refactoring code testdriven development build infrastructure optimizing software debugging building toolsliliExperience in building internal tools from scratchliliPassionate about reducing bottlenecks and streamlining processesbrliulWere passionate about creating and nurturing a respectful and inclusive workplace that promotes and values diversity We try to make work a place where you can relax and be yourself so you can succeed and feel great about your work Were excited to see applications from folks of all backgrounds and hope you want to join our growing teambrbrWe offer a full benefits package to all employees including healthvisiondental coverage 402k matching unlimited PTO with high expectations for employees taking time off flexible Fridays a OneMedical membership and more
